INFO.name: query
INFO.value: SELECT TOP 3 source_id, ra, dec, parallax, pmra, pmdec, radial_velocity, phot_g_mean_mag FROM gaia.dr3lite WHERE radial_velocity IS NOT NULL

RESOURCE.INFO:
If you use public Gaia DR3 data in a paper, please take note of `ESAC's guide`_ on how to acknowledge and cite it.
.. _ESAC's guide: https://gea.esac.esa.int/archive/documentation/GDR3/Miscellaneous/sec_credit_and_citation_instructions/

FIELD.name: source_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Gaia DR3 unique source identifier. Note that this *cannot* be matched against the DR1 or DR2 source_ids.

FIELD.name: ra
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Barycentric Right Ascension in ICRS at epoch J2016.0

FIELD.name: dec
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Barycentric Declination in ICRS at epoch J2016.0

FIELD.name: parallax
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Absolute barycentric stellar parallax of the source at the reference epoch J2016.0. If looking for a distance, consider joining with gedr3dist.main and using the distances from there.

FIELD.name: pmra
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Proper motion in right ascension of the source in ICRS at J2016.0. This is the tangent plane projection of the proper motion vector in the direction of increasing right ascension.

FIELD.name: pmdec
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Proper motion in declination at J2016.0.

FIELD.name: radial_velocity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Spectroscopic radial velocity in the solar barycentric reference frame. For stars brighter than about 12 mag, this is the median of all single-epoch measurements. For fainter stars, RV estimation is from a co-added spectrum.

FIELD.name: phot_g_mean_mag
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Mean magnitude in the G band. This is computed from the G-band mean flux applying the magnitude zero-point in the Vega scale. To obtain error estimates, see phot_g_mean_flux_over_error.
